text: Colleen Loach (born April 10, 1983) is a Canadian equestrian who competes in the sport of eventing.COC ProfileFei profile Loach won a bronze medal as part of the Canadian eventing team at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto.Silver for Jessica Phoenix, Bronze for Canadian Eventing Team at the Toronto 2015 Pan Am Games In July 2016, she was named to Canada's Olympic team. At the Games held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Loach placed 10th in the team competition and finished 42nd individually, collecting 145.70 penalties across the three phases aboard the Selle Français gelding Qorry Blue d'Argogues. ==CCI 5* Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=13 align=center | Results |- !
